serverMode.portHint: The service port on the phone. If the default port is occupied, you can choose another port.
serverMode.connectionTokenHint: The token to be used when connecting to the service, with a length of at least 6 characters. Once you start the server mode, the token will be automatically saved for easier reuse next time.
serverMode.keepAwakeHint: Prevent the device from entering standby mode and avoid sleep mode due to inactivity. If your device cannot provide connection services after entering standby mode, you can enable this feature.

message.serverMode: Turn the device into a server and connect to it using a browser on a computer for a larger screen and more convenient operation. Please ensure the connecting computer is on the same local network or properly configured with routing.
message.networkSuggestion: It's recommended to use WiFi or Ethernet on the device. The current network connection type is {{type}}.
message.thankYouForClickAd: Thank you for your support! Every ad click is a valuable contribution to maintaining $t(appName).
message.thankYouForWatchAd: Thank you for your support! Every ad view is a tremendous help in maintaining $t(appName).

desktop.wrongConnectionToken: Incorrect connection token. Please ensure the token matches the one set on the device.
